description.value:
Prerequisite: Warlock, Daughter's Promises feat

Benefit: You gain a +3 bonus to all skill checks related to performing a ritual for each milestone you have achieved so far today.

Update (2/18/2010)

Change benefit to "You gain a +3 bonus to all skill checks related to performing a ritual for each milestone you have achieved so far today."

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 51.
